Class Operation

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.Operation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Operation>
public final class Operation extends Object implements Comparable<Operation>
An operation is a sequence of steps to be performed on a field controller.
Author:
Douglas Lau

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Destroy the operation. The operation gets destroyed after processing is complete and it is removed from the queue.
